name: Block n' Slash
description:
Made in 2 weeks for the 1st ESCOM videogame club jam. A small fighting-like game with two possible player moves: Block and Slash.

A deadly evil looms over the horizon, and the is no one but you, the blue knight, who has de power to free the kingdom from darkness.

Battle enemies in a duel with your trusty sword and shield, predict their movements and take them to the oblivion.

Special thanks to:
SkitchstudioMain for the song Ze Blade Cutter
